text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM><TEXT>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben:</TEXT><BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR><TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR><TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR><TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hübner</AUTHOR><TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE><FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE><FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Übungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"Multiple corrections were made to the XML. 1. Corrected numerous garbled Unicode characters to properly display German umlauts (ü, ä) and standardize book formats (e.g., '8vo'). 2. Fixed a structural error where one bibliographic entry (<BIBL>) was incorrectly nested within another; all entries are now siblings. 3. Improved semantic structure by wrapping the introductory sentence in a <TEXT> tag. 4. Replaced the ambiguous author reference 'deßelben' ('of the same') with the explicit author 'Johann Arndt' from the preceding entry. 5. Removed extraneous text and punctuation (e.g., '; Item', 'in', '.') from between tags to create cleaner, non-mixed content."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM><TEXT>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben:</TEXT><BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR><TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR><TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR><TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hübner</AUTHOR><TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE><FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE><FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Übungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: Multiple corrections were made to the XML. 1. Corrected numerous garbled Unicode characters to properly display German umlauts (ü, ä) and standardize book formats (e.g., '8vo'). 2. Fixed a structural error where one bibliographic entry (<BIBL>) was incorrectly nested within another; all entries are now siblings. 3. Improved semantic structure by wrapping the introductory sentence in a <TEXT> tag. 4. Replaced the ambiguous author reference 'deßelben' ('of the same') with the explicit author 'Johann Arndt' from the preceding entry. 5. Removed extraneous text and punctuation (e.g., '; Item', 'in', '.') from between tags to create cleaner, non-mixed content.
